content: **knitted socks for men in drops nord the piece is worked top down sizes 38 - 46 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no-081 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 38/40 - 41/43 - 44/46 foot-length 24-27-30 cm leg-height 15-16-17 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 16 jeans blue **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
